title: "Tesla to seek shareholder approval for stock split; shares surge"
excerpt: "Tesla Inc will seek investor approval to increase its number of shares to enable a stock split in the form of a dividend, the electric-car maker said on Monday, sending its shares up about 5%. The plan came as the company suspended its Shanghai factory amid COVID-19-related lockdown measures and its artificial intelligence"
